FuncDef:
The reverse mode auto-resume command sets the alarm inversion mode to automatic recovery.
The undo reverse interface command deletes the alarm reversion mode.
By default, the alarm reversion mode is not configured on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the reverse mode auto-resume command has been run to set the alarm inversion mode of global alarms to automatic recovery, run the reverse interface command in the interface view to configure alarm inversion on an interface.
Configuration Impact
After the reverse mode auto-resume command has been run to set the alarm inversion mode of global alarms to automatic recovery, the system checks key alarms on the interface that has alarm inversion configured. If no key alarm exists, the system automatically deletes the alarm inversion configuration.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the reverse interface command to configure alarm inversion on an interface.
